body:
Hey guys I'm finally home, i had to go away for a while, but basically saying i haven't quit Avicus or whatever, I've returned :D


Anyways I've been gone about a month, so it feels like I've missed an ion of time on here, so someone please update me, what did i miss if anything?
body_tagged:

title: I'm Back :)

replies.body: Hey welcome back to Avicus! The staff tags changed colours, new prestiges, staff applications are open until the end of the month and just the usual Avicus stuff :P Glad your back! See you around :)
replies.body_tagged: Hey welcome back to Avicus! The staff tags changed colours, new prestiges, staff applications are open until the end of the month and just the usual Avicus stuff :P Glad your back! See you around :)

replies.body:
Frosted told you everything except for the new update Avicus is having in some weeks/months so you should take a look at the sneak-peaks Ivy is giving through Facebook! :D

P.S: Welcome back, I remember I played lots of matches with you :P

replies.body:
Welcome back!
But this thread is spam, and spam gets locked.
In the future refrain from posting similar threads, thanks.
